answers.author: Katharine Greenlee
answers.text:
Hi Pam, 
Check out these resources from the Knowledge Network that might be able to help answer your question: 
Douglas County, NV Provides Interjurisdictional GIS Services: http://icma.org/en/Article/101665/Douglas_County_NV_Provides_Interjurisdictional_GIS_Services
GIS Topic Page: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/113/GIS
Hopefully these two links will head you in the right direction. 
Katharine
Community Engagement Manager, Knowledge Network
kgreenlee@icma.org

answers.author: Kelsey Rydland
answers.text:
Pam,
There is a 23 member local government organization which has created an "interjurisdictional GIS" system outside of Chicago. You can see an example of our GIS web application by visiting: http://www.gisconsortium.org/mapoffice/ Let me know if you have any questions.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interesting in learning if any cities have implemented “interjurisdicational GIS” systems.  Please send any documentation, links, etc to the undersigned.
Thank you!
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Interjuisdicational GIS Systems
